attributes.action: Stop allowing travel companies to hike the prices up in school holidays.
attributes.background: It seems so unfair that the same holiday in the same hotel or resort can go up in price so dramatically as soon as the kids break up. This not only affects families, but teachers as well.

rejection.details:
Prices are the responsibility of holiday companies and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for holiday companies to increase their prices during school holidays.
